import React, { useContext } from "react"; import './Cartitems.css' import { CartContext } from "./CartContext"; import remove_icon from "../Components/Assets/cart_cross_icon.png" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Cartitems = () => { const { getTotalCartAmount, products, cartItems, removefromcart } = useContext(CartContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{products.map((e, index)=> { if(cartItems[e.id] > 0) { return (

{e.name}

Rs{e.new_price}

Rs{e.new_price * cartItems[e.id]}

{ removefromcart(e.id) }} alt="" />
) } else { return null; // Return null when the condition is not met } } )}

Cart Totals

Subtotal

Rs{getTotalCartAmount()}

Shipping Fee

Free

Total

Rs{getTotalCartAmount()}

) } export default Cartitems;
